title: Indian butter chicken (Chicken Makhani)
ingredients: ['For the spice mix', '2 teaspoons garam masala', '2 teaspoons tandoori masala powder', '2 teaspoons Madras curry powder', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1/2 teaspoon ground cardamom', '1/2 teaspoon ground cayenne pepper', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', 'For the curry', '680g boneless, skinless chicken thighs, cut into bite-size pieces', '3 tablespoons butter, divided', '1 onion, chopped', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '2 teaspoons chopped fresh ginger', '250g tomato puree', '235ml single cream', '60ml plain yogurt', '40g cashews', '1 bunch fresh coriander, stems removed']
